A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Awesome and entertaining movie but lacked the \"feels\" of a Star Wars movie.  Rian Johnson missed the mark.  I'm sure newer fans and young fans will love it but it lacked nostalgia.  I felt numb after seeing it and it wasn't until the next morning that I realized I was disappointed.  Hopefully JJ Abrams redeems the franchise in 2019.
